EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.94}.

SC.Q: What is the average heat value for label Service Quality on the x-axis?
SC.A: The average heat value for Service Quality on the x-axis is {0.69}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Transport and Family or the cell corresponding to Attractions and Rural?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Attractions} and {Rural} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Tour Operators and Eco-tourism or the cell corresponding to Online Booking and Seasonal?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Online Booking} and {Seasonal} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Online Booking and Eco-tourism or the cell corresponding to Hotels and Rural?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Online Booking} and {Eco-tourism} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Marketing and Cultural or the cell corresponding to Events and Seasonal?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Marketing} and {Cultural} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.59 to 0.75?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Cruises, Adventure), (Tour Operators, Adventure), (Attractions, Budget), (Destinations, Budget), (Service Quality, Budget), (Transport, Budget), (Cruises, Business), (Events, Business), (Online Booking, Business), (Tour Operators, Business), (Destinations, Cultural), (Hotels, Cultural), (Marketing, Cultural), (Service Quality, Cultural), (Events, Eco-tourism), (Online Booking, Eco-tourism), (Events, Family), (Online Booking, Family), (Destinations, Luxury), (Hotels, Luxury), (Marketing, Luxury), (Service Quality, Luxury), (Cruises, Rural), (Events, Rural), (Online Booking, Rural), (Tour Operators, Rural), (Attractions, Seasonal), (Destinations, Seasonal), (Service Quality, Seasonal), (Transport, Seasonal), (Cruises, Wellness), (Tour Operators, Wellness)}.
